alert.note: Alert for Morton; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 9:46PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Morton and southwestern Stevens Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 946 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elkhart, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wilburton around 1000 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Rolla and Feterita. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southwestern Kansas.
